name: GeeWhizz
description:
Gee Whizz is a game about propelling yourself through space with various tools you find floating around in the debris of a damaged spaceship. Your goal is to explore the ship's remnants, solving puzzles to progress to the next section.

Tools can be picked up with E and dropped with D. Dropping them will push you back a little bit depending on their weight and also rotate you, since you threw it, you numpty.

Created as part of a four week, arcade inspired project following the theme of "One More Go"

Created by:

Payton Lodziak

Rizing Games
Cambridge Regional College
